article_title: Ban lifted on new methadone programs in Indiana

article_metadata.author:
MAUREEN HAYDEN
CNHI state reporter

og.description: INDIANAPOLIS — A swelling tide of heroin and opioid addictions are prompting a the state to soften its ban on new methadone clinics.
